question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept all major credit and debit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and select "Buy Now, Pay Later" options such as Klarna and Afterpay.

question: Is my payment information secure?
answer: Yes. All transactions are processed through encrypted payment gateways that comply with PCI DSS security standards. We never store your card details.

question: Do I need to create an account to place an order?
answer: No, you can check out as a guest. However, creating an account allows you to track orders, manage returns, and receive special offers.

question: How can I track my order?
answer: Once your order ships, you’ll receive a tracking link via email or SMS. You can also log in to your account to track the delivery status anytime.

question: How long will it take to receive my order?
answer: Standard shipping usually takes 3–7 business days, depending on your location. Express delivery options are available at checkout for faster service.

question: Do you offer international shipping?
answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. Shipping times and fees vary based on destination and local customs regulations.

question: How much does shipping cost?
answer: Shipping is free for orders over $50. For smaller orders, shipping fees are calculated at checkout based on your address and selected shipping method.

question: Can I change or cancel my order after placing it?
answer: Orders can be changed or canceled within one hour of placement. After that, the order is likely already in processing and can’t be modified.

question: What should I do if I entered the wrong address?
answer: Contact our customer support as soon as possible at support@company.com. If the order hasn’t shipped yet, we can update the address.

question: What if my order hasn’t arrived yet?
answer: Check your tracking information first. If it shows "delivered" but you haven’t received it, contact our support team for assistance.

question: What is your return policy?
answer: We accept returns within 30 days of delivery for most items, provided they are unused and in original packaging. Some exclusions apply (e.g., final sale items).

question: How do I start a return?
answer: Go to your order history, click "Request Return", select the item, and print the prepaid return label. Drop the package at your nearest shipping point.

question: When will I receive my refund?
answer: Once we receive and inspect your returned item, your refund will be processed within 3–5 business days. Refunds appear in your account within 7–10 days.

question: Can I exchange an item instead of returning it?
answer: Yes. If the replacement is in stock, we’ll process an exchange once the original item is returned. Exchanges are subject to availability.

question: What should I do if I received a damaged or defective product?
answer: Please contact support@company.com within 48 hours of delivery with photos of the issue. We’ll send a replacement or issue a full refund.

question: Do you offer gift wrapping or personalized messages?
answer: Yes, gift wrapping and message cards are available at checkout for a small additional fee.

question: Can I use multiple promo codes on one order?
answer: Only one promo code can be applied per order. However, promo codes can be combined with automatic discounts such as free shipping offers.

question: How can I use a gift card?
answer: Enter the gift card code at checkout. The balance will automatically apply to your total. If your order exceeds the balance, you can pay the difference.

question: How do I know what size to order?
answer: Each product page includes a detailed size chart. You can also use our "Find My Fit" tool for personalized recommendations.

question: Are your products authentic?
answer: Yes. All products sold on our website are 100% authentic and sourced directly from verified suppliers or official brand partners.

question: Do you restock sold-out items?
answer: Popular items are often restocked. You can click "Notify Me" on a product page to receive an email when the item becomes available again.

question: How do I contact customer support?
answer: You can reach us by email at support@company.com or through live chat on our website, available Monday–Friday, 9 AM–6 PM (local time).

question: Do you offer wholesale or bulk discounts?
answer: Yes. For orders over 50 units, contact sales@company.com for wholesale pricing and partnership opportunities.

question: What should I do if I forgot my password?
answer: Go to the login page and click "Forgot Password". You’ll receive an email with a secure link to reset your password.

question: Can I subscribe to your newsletter?
answer: Absolutely. Sign up via the footer on our website to receive updates on new arrivals, exclusive discounts, and seasonal sales.

question: Are there any hidden fees at checkout?
answer: No. The total price displayed at checkout includes all applicable taxes and fees. International orders may incur customs duties based on your country.

question: How can I apply for a return if I bought as a guest?
answer: Visit the "Track My Order" page, enter your email and order number, then click "Return an Item".

question: Do you offer loyalty rewards?
answer: Yes, our rewards program lets you earn points for purchases, reviews, and referrals. Points can be redeemed for discounts on future orders.

question: Can I preorder upcoming items?
answer: Yes. Preorder products are clearly marked and shipped on the release date shown on the product page.

question: How do I delete my account or personal data?
answer: Contact privacy@company.com to request account deletion or data export under GDPR/CCPA compliance.
